casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Kentreal Jarbar HOWARD 2018-KO-1650 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 6, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FIRST CIRCUIT, PARISH OF TERREBONNE Writ denied. WEIMER, J., recused.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and docket and assigns reasons.

Crichton, J., would grant in part and docket.

I would grant in part and docket to examine the defendant's claim of insufficiency of evidence for the fourth felony offender adjudication and his resulting 30 year hard labor sentence.
